name: NomadAtlas
description: A web app for remote workers to find a working friendly place with affordable cost. User can calculate monthly cost of living in different places.

name: Thoughts
description: Build a full-stack post platform with secure authentication, protected routes and user- specific content management using Next.js architecture.

name: Sports Management Website
description: Sports Club Management System (SCMS) is a web-based platform designed to streamline and simplify the management of sports clubs. It enables club administrators to efficiently handle court bookings, manage members, schedule events, and track resources, all from a centralized dashboard. With a modern frontend built using React and a backend powered by Node.js & Express, the system ensures a smooth, responsive, and secure experience. It also includes authentication for user role management (admins, members), real-time updates, and easy-to-use forms for managing bookings and registrations.The goal of SCMS is to reduce manual work, enhance coordination, and provide a seamless user experience for both club staff and members.

name: Plant Care Website
description: A responsive website that insure plants health by track it watering time, watering amount build with built with React, Firebase, and MongoDB

name: Food Tracking Website
description: A responsive web app to track food items' expiry dates, alert users about nearly expired and expired foods, built with React, Firebase, and MongoDB
